title: Hey how do you post a picture to the boards?

replies.body: Copy paste the link into your post.

> [{quoted}](name=Vistha Kai,realm=EUNE,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xPkRO3t6,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-30T20:36:57.668+0000)
>
> Copy paste the link.

like if i took a screenshot on my computer, i just hit copy on the picture? and paste on the boards?

Paste the link to your computer drive for bonus points.

No, the link refers to the url of an image, that was posted on an image-sharing website, like Imgur.

> [{quoted}](name=Kerchner12,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=xPkRO3t6,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-05-30T20:37:41.484+0000)
>
> like if i took a screenshot on my computer, i just hit copy on the picture? and paste on the boards?

You'll need to use an image service like imgur, etc to host the picture first.
